title: BRIEF-Ov2 Signs Business Combination Agreement With Freightera Logistics Inc.
text:
BRIEF-Ov2 Signs Business Combination Agreement With Freightera Logistics Inc.

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 12, 2019 17:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Ov2 Signs Business Combination Agreement With Freightera Logistics Inc. OV2 Investment 1 Inc OVOp.V : * OV2 SIGNS BUSINESS COMBINATION AGREEMENT WITH FREIGHTERA LOGISTICS INC. * OV2 INVESTMENT 1 INC - ENTERED INTO A BUSINESS COMBINATION AGREEMENT DATED AUGUST 30, 2019 WITH FREIGHTERA LOGISTICS INC AND SUBCO

BRIEF-Ov2 Signs Business Combination Agreement With Freightera Logistics Inc.
